author: pipermerriam
content: Call in 1 hour 20 minutes.  Considering this the "implementers kick-off call".

author: dankrad.eth
content: <@!420951281910284289> Full is opposed to partial -- i.e. it means there is not just a reduction of active state (partial stateless does that), but providing witnesses for everything

author: dankrad.eth
content: it is not opposed to weak -- weak statelessness means that validating the chain is possible without any state access, but proposing needs the state

author: dankrad.eth
content: Weak statelessness has the advantage that it gives us much more freedom in witness construction. Having to construction block witnesses from transaction witnesses excludes some of the most efficient witness accumulation schemes

author: dankrad.eth
content: it also means having to think about things like DSA, which are simply not a problem with weak statelessness

author: pipermerriam
content: Please fill out this doodle.  Call is being rescheduled, chime in with what works for you: https://doodle.com/poll/zg3wkciag7tcxdgh?utm_source=poll&utm_medium=link
